abstract: New York Rangers will finally play in the newly renovated Madison Square Garden after a preseason that included traveling 16,000 miles across two continents.
snippet: The Rangers traveled 16,000 miles across two continents during the preseason and the early part of the regular season. Now, finally, they’re ready to play at the Garden.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers traveled 16,000 miles across two continents during the preseason and the early part of the regular season. Now, finally, they’re ready to play at the Garden.

headline.main: After 16,000 Miles, the Rangers Skate on Home Ice
headline.print_headline: After 16,000 Miles, the Rangers Skate on Home Ice
headline.seo: After Epic Trip, New York Rangers Ready for First Home Game
